name: @fulcrumapp/fulcrum-js
description: JavaScript and TypeScript wrapper for the Fulcrum API

scripts.build: yarn run build:generated && yarn run build:wrapper
scripts.build:generated: yarn --cwd generated install --frozen-lockfile && yarn --cwd generated run build
scripts.ci:test: yarn run build:generated && yarn run build:wrapper && yarn run test:coverage
scripts.generate: yarn dlx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i openapi/rest-api.json -g typescript-axios -o generated --additional-properties=npmName=fulcrum-generated,npmVersion=3.0.0,supportsES6=true,withSeparateModelsAndApi=true,apiPackage=api,modelPackage=models,importFileExtension=.js,useSingleRequestParameter=true,stringEnums=true,withInterfaces=true,generateApiDocumentation=false,generateModelDocumentation=false --skip-validate-spec && rm -rf generated/docs
scripts.generate:full: yarn run download:spec && yarn run generate && yarn run build

author: Jason Sanford (jasonsanford@gmail.com)
